<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PLUME: Look at these marvels.. Friends, we have discovered a new species of lifeforms native to this star system!
2 1
MELORAE: I've never seen lifeforms such as these before! They look mesmerizing, dancing on the surface of the water..
3 2
THATCH: Goodness!! Keep your distance, my friends: these species generate a terrifying voltage of bioelectricity!
4 3
THATCH: How fascinating! I cannot imagine what new species of life we may discover as we explore the rest of this star system.
Pioneer EX3 1
